# Change Log
All notable changes to the "arduino-snippets" extension will be documented in this file.

### 1.0.3 (Dec 27, 2019)
* Snippets only triggered on cpp language.

### 1.0.2 (Dec 06, 2018)
* New functions added.

### 1.0.1 (Sep 15, 2018)
* Remove vsciot-vscode.vscode-arduino dependency.

### 1.0.0 (Sep 14, 2018)
* Initial release.
